panels.description: Running time of Flink jobs
panels.title: Job Uptime History

panels.description: Flink cluster slot allocation and usage with area visualization
panels.title: Flink Task Slot Allocation

panels.description: Number of Flink jobs currently running
panels.title: Flink Job Count

panels.description: Number of Flink jobs currently running
panels.title: Flink Job Fail Count

panels.description: Number of Flink jobs restarted
panels.title: Flink Job Restart Count

panels.description: Shows if the Flink components are currently running
panels.title: Flink Cluster Status

panels.description: Last checkpoint duration for Iceberg Files Committer operations grouped by job name
panels.title: Iceberg Files Committer Checkpoint Duration by Job

panels.description: Records processed per second by Flink job
panels.title: Flink Job Throughput (Records/sec)

panels.description: Average and max Kafka Producer metadata wait time in nanoseconds by topic
panels.title: Kafka Producer Metadata Wait Time by Topic

panels.description: Usage of individual CPU cores
panels.title: CPU Core Usage

panels.description: Shows the number of queued output buffers in Flink's network stack.
panels.title: Input Queue Length by Job & Subtask

panels.description: Shows the number of queued output buffers in Flink's network stack. High values indicate potential backpressure issues.
panels.title: Output Queue Length by Job & Subtask

panels.description: Shows Kafka consumer lag per job and subtask, indicating how far behind each consumer is from the latest message.
panels.title: Consumer Lag

panels.description: Count of Kafka producer record errors over 5-minute windows by job and subtask. Any non-zero values indicate failed attempts to send records to Kafka.
panels.title: Producer Record Errors (5min)

panels.description: Shows the ratio of successful Kafka commits to total commit attempts over 5-minute windows. Values below 1.0 indicate commit failures.

targets.expr:
sum by (job_name, subtask_index) (increase(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_commitsSucceeded[5m])) / 
(sum by (job_name, subtask_index) (increase(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_commitsSucceeded[5m])) + sum by (job_name, subtask_index) (increase(flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_commitsFailed[5m])) + 0.1)

panels.title: Kafka Commit Success Rate

panels.description: Shows the gap between currently processed offset and last committed offset. Large gaps indicate infrequent commits or potential checkpoint issues.

targets.expr:
clamp_min(
  sum by (job_name, subtask_index, topic, partition) (flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_topic_partition_currentOffset) - sum by (job_name, subtask_index, topic, partition) (flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaSourceReader_topic_partition_committedOffset),
  0
)

panels.title: Current vs Committed Offset Gap

panels.description: Time in seconds since each Kafka consumer subtask last polled for records. High values may indicate stalled consumers or processing backpressure.
panels.title: Consumer Last Poll Time

panels.description: Count of Kafka producer record retry attempts over 5-minute windows. Retries indicate transient issues with Kafka brokers or network.
panels.title: Producer Retries (5min)

panels.description: Percentage of Kafka producer buffer space currently in use. Higher values indicate the producer is approaching its memory limit for buffering records.

targets.expr: sum by (job_name, subtask_index) (flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaProducer_buffer_total_bytes - flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaProducer_buffer_available_bytes) / sum by (job_name, subtask_index) (flink_taskmanager_job_task_operator_KafkaProducer_buffer_total_bytes)

panels.title: Producer Buffer Usage

panels.description: Rate at which Kafka producer buffers are becoming exhausted. Higher rates indicate potential throughput issues or backpressure from Kafka brokers.
panels.title: Producer Buffer Exhaustion Rate
